Package cosc201.unionfind

Class UF3

java.lang.Object
cosc201.unionfind.UF3
All Implemented Interfaces:
UnionFind
public class UF3 extends Object implements UnionFind
The third union-find implementation using local representatives augmented by a rank function. Time for union is big-Theta of time for find. Time for find is Theta(log n) in worst case.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    UF3()
    Constructs a new uninitialised union-find instance using ranks.

    • union

      public void union(int x, int y)
      Join the groups containing two elements. The new representative is the previous representative of larger rank. This ensures that the rank increases only if the two ranks are equal. If the ranks are equal, the representative of the second element is the new representative.
      Specified by:
      union in interface UnionFind
      Parameters:
      x - the first element
      y - the second element
